A4.text: The Hockey Hall of Fame, the latter housed in a former Bank of Montreal office, once Canada's largest bank branch.

A5.text: The line rises slightly near Front Street, marking the pre-landfill shoreline. Here, at the southern edge of the central business district, is the Dominion Public Building, the Meridian Hall and the Hockey Hall of Fame, the latter housed in a former Bank of Montreal office, once Canada's largest bank branch.
